His wife used to always help him with this activity and also did the household chores.  However, an unfortunate recent event left his wife ill and unable to do her normal activities because having fallen she suffered an injury to her spinal column and the pain and discomfort persist to this day.  Because of this, Elio has requested a loan to be able to take Tomasa to a specialist who can help her with this inconvenience and also to pay for any medicine that this may require thus improving her quality of life because illness at home robs them of time that under normal circumstances is very productive.

Elio is grateful for the openness and sensibility of Fundación Alternativa who provide him with the opportunity of obtaining this loan by means of Kiva lenders from whom he’s sure to also get the required support.

loans.use: to pay for his wife's medical treatments.

loans.name: Cipriana

texts.es: La Sra. Cipriana  tiene 41 años, casada con tres hijos de las edades de 8 y 19 y 3 años,  ella se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad en su  tienda de barrio que se encuentran en la localidad de El Torno,   este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  va a usar este préstamo  para la compra de una motocicleta ya que esto le permitirá transportarse para realizar algunas compras para su negocio, la Sra. Cipriana enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia ya que existen varias tiendas en la zona, va a utilizar los beneficios en la compra de mas mercadería para surtir su tienda y seguir creciendo más cada día, su deseo para  su negocio es de seguir vendiendo y tener una tienda surtida, así poder hacer crecer su negocio mejorar sus ingresos y por ende mejorar la calidad de vida de ella y de su familia.
texts.en:
Cipriana, 41, is married with three children aged 8, 19 and 3 years.  She works selling basic staples in her neighborhood store located in El Torno.  

This loan is her first sequence in the institution and she’ll use it to buy a motorcycle that will make it easier for her to get from place to place to make purchases for her store.  Cipriana faces the challenge of competition because there are several stores in her zone.  

She is going to use profits to buy more merchandise to stock her store and continue growing more every day.  Her wish for her business is to continue selling and to have a well-stocked store to make her business grow and to improve her income thus improving her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Aleksi

texts.en:
Aleksi is 33 years old. He lives in Akhmeta District with his wife. They run a small-scale agricultural business and grow different kinds of vegetables which are used by the family. The only source of income for the family is a small income earned by Aleksi, working locally as an auto mechanic. 

Several times, Aleksi requested a loan from local financial institutions for a family business start-up, but without any success. His loan request was rejected each time, because of low income and his family’s poor living conditions. 

Aleksi requested a loan from Credo to restart-up a trading business and to set up a store where auto parts and accessories will be sold. Aleksi was in this business seven years ago and has enough experience in this field. 

He has now been approved for a loan within the framework of the new joint initiative between Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisages provision of business start-up and re-startup credits, with soft conditions to rural poor people, who do not have access to credit products. These rural poor people are regarded as 'high-risk borrowers' because of their low income. 

With his credit, Aleksi will purchase stocks of auto parts and sell them from his store to local drivers. Thanks to this loan, Aleksi will have his own lucrative business and his life, as well as his wife’s, will be considerably improved.

loans.use: to restart his business and set up an auto parts store.

loans.name: Kayi

texts.fr: Accoucheuse de profession, Kayi pour subvenir à ses besoins revend aussi des bois de chauffage depuis 2009 à domicile. Le second crédit sollicité de  WAGES servira à la cliente d’acheter des bois de chauffe. Comme perspectives d’avenir, elle espère rendre pérenne son activité et avoir une bonne condition de vie. Elle est âgée de 44ans.
texts.en:
Kayi, age 44, is a midwife. To support herself, she also started selling firewood from her home in 2009. 

This second loan from WAGES will help her to buy firewood for resale. In the long term, she wants to make her activity sustainable and enjoy good living conditions.

loans.use: to buy firewood for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to bolster his stock of merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Uno Group

texts.es: El Banco de emprendimiento UNO Está  compuesto por ocho integrantes seis mujeres y dos varones,  la presidenta del banco es la Sra.  Rosalía en la foto (parada primera desde la izquierda polera verde con cartera color plomo) tiene 32 años, tiene dos hijos de las edades de 6 y 13 años, ella  se dedica  a la   venta de cosméticos por catalogo, ella vende sus productos de manera ambulante, visitando domicilios y oficinas públicas y privadas de la ciudad Santa Cruz,  donde ofrece sus productos,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra.  Rosalía va a utilizar este préstamo para la compra de cosmético y joyas por mayor y que se encuentran en promoción y de esta manera brindar variedad de productos a su clientela e incrementar sus ganancias,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir mejorando en su  negocio, la Sra.  Rosalía va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando variedad de productos de belleza, la Sra.  Rosalía es una persona joven y muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada a ella ya sus compañeras de grupo ya que en algunos casos mantienen solas a sus familias.
texts.en:
The Enterprising Bank UNO is made up of eight members; six women and two men. The president of the bank is Rosalía (in the photo she is the first on the left wearing a green shirt and a grey purse). She is 32 years old and has two children ages 6 and 13. She sells cosmetics through catalogues. She is a street vender and sells her products visiting homes and public and private offices in Santa Cruz where she offers her products. This is her first loan sequence in the institution. 

Rosalía will use the loan to purchase cosmetics and jewellery wholesale and on sale and in this way be able to provide various products to her customers and increase her earnings. Her reason for requesting this loan is to improve her business. Rosalía will use the profits to continue buying various beauty products. Rosalía is a young person who works hard. She is happy for the opportunity given to her and her colleagues in the group as some support their families alone.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics and jewellery wholesale.

loans.name: Lina Ximena

texts.es:
Ella es Lina, ella tiene 26 años, ella quiere salir adelante para poder darle un mejor bienestar y futuro a sus hijos, vive en casa de  sus padres quienes han dado  el apoyo que ella ha necesitado durante mucho tiempo.
Con el paso del tiempo ha comprendido que el estudio es fundamental en la vida de las personas y que sin este no se tiene herramientas para progresar y seguir adelante.  Hace seis meses tomo la decisión de iniciar su vida academica profesional, y por ellos se encuentra estudiando contabilidad financiera,  las dos personas mas importantes en su vida son sus dos pequeños, ellos estan en el colegio y su dependencia total es de su mama Lina, ella es quien cubre todos los gastos economicos de ellos.
Se encuentra trabajando en una empresa de aseo, su labor le exige mucho esfuerzo, por esto ella desea progresar, para poder cambiar su historia de vida y a su vez su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Lina is 26 years old and would like to get ahead in order to provide a better future and better well-being for her children. She lives at home with her parents who have given her the help and support she has needed for a long time. 

Over time, Lina has come to understand that education is fundamental, and without it she would be without the tools necessary to progress and get ahead. Six months ago she made the decision to begin studying a professional career, and she is now studying financial accounting. 

The two most important people in Lina's life are her two children, both of whom are in school and who depend completely on Lina to cover all of their expenses. She works for a cleaning service, which requires a lot of hard work. By studying, she would like to change her path in life and at the same time improve her living standards.

loans.use: to finish her studies in financial accounting

loans.name: Marta Angelica

texts.es: Marta de 39 años de edad se dedica a la venta de especies y ajos por mayor desde hace 4 años, vende de forma ambulante en los mercados que están cerca de su lugar de residencia tiene mucha clientela pues es un producto muy vendible, con las ganancias que obtiene ayuda en los gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hija de 9 años, marta esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar ajos por mayor para seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y asi poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Marta, 39, has worked selling spices and garlic in bulk for four years. She sells at street markets that are near her house and has many customers, as her products are very marketable. With her earnings, Marta helps with the household expenses. She lives in her own house with her husband and her nine-year-old daughter. 

Marta is applying for a loan to buy garlic in bulk in order to continue her business, because it is her only source of income and allows her to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy garlic in bulk.

loans.name: Primero De Enero  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El Grupo de Crédito Primero de Enero está formado por 7 mujeres y 1 hombre quienes laboran a diario en diferentes actividades económicas, las mismas que le permiten solventar los gastos de sus hogares y sacarles adelante a sus hijos. Viven por los alrededores de la parroquia del Valle en Cuenca, lugar de hermosos paisajes y de verdes campos, su gente se dedica a la crianza de animales, a la agricultura, al comercio y muchos laboran en la ciudad ejerciendo diferentes actividades, aun mantienen vivas las llamas de su cultura y tradiciones.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Mónica, se encuentra formando parte del grupo de crédito Primero de Enero desde hace 3 años y medio, en todo este tiempo ha logrado establecer una mejor amistad con todos los integrantes de este hermoso grupo, todas tienen un carisma especial y siempre se encuentran prestas para ayudarse en lo que este a su alcance.

Doña Mónica tiene 37 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 18 y 5 años de edad, su primer hijo estudia en la universidad y su segundo hijo está en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo es un profesional en la elaboración de estucos (cielos rasos) y tiene su negocio propio, la casa en la que viven es el fruto del esfuerzo del trabajo conyugal.

La Señora Mónica desde hace 16 años se dedica a la venta de cosméticos, primero se inicio con la venta de una sola marca pero poco a poco ha ido creciendo en su negocio y ahora se dedica a la venta de varias marcas conocida en el país, en todo este tiempo ha logrado obtener un clientela fija y selecta. También es toda una profesional en la rama de la belleza la cual también ejerce. 

El dinero de su crédito va a invertir en la compra de cosméticos de oferta para incrementar su mercadería. 

Su meta es tener más cosméticos para vender por exhibición desde su casa.
texts.en:
The Primero de Enero communal bank is comprised of seven women and one man.  They work every day at different business activities.  These business activities allow them to pay their household expenses and to get their children ahead.  They live in the outskirts of the Valle parish in Cuenca.  This place has beautiful scenery and green fields.  Its people raise animals, work in agriculture, and work in commerce.  Many of them work in the city carrying out different business activities.  They still keep the flames of their culture and traditions alive.

Mónica is one of the members of this group.  She has been part of the Primero de Enero communal bank for three and a half years.  In all of this time she has managed to establish a better friendship with all of the members of this lovely group.  They all have a special charisma, and they are always willing to help each other as much as they can.

Mónica, age 37, is married and she and her husband have two children, ages 18 and 5.  Her first son goes to the university, and her second son attends a small city school.  Her husband is a professional in making stucco (ceilings), and he has his own business.  The house in which they live is the fruit of their joint work effort.

Mónica has been selling cosmetics for 16 years.  She first started by selling only one brand.  However, little by little, her business has been growing.  She now sells various brands that are well-known in the country.  In all of this time she has managed to get a fixed and select clientele.  She is also a complete professional in the field of beauty, which she also exercises.

She will use the loan to by cosmetics on special in order to increase her merchandise.  Her goal is to have more cosmetics to sell by showing them at her house.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Reyna De Los Angeles Group

texts.es:
Este es el grupo Reyna de los Angeles
Una de las socias es Yennifer de 20 años. Ella es soltera y vive con sus padres, gracias a sus estudios de computación está trabajando para una empresa y por su propia cuenta.Yennifer se dedica a instalar programas de computo y al arreglo de computadoras, con los ingresos que percibe puede pagarse sus propios estudios y ayudar a sus padres con los gastos de alimentación, este crédito es importante para ella porque podrá comprar algunas piezas y accesorios de computo para continuar con su trabajo y seguir arreglando computadoras, esta agradecida por facilitarle este préstamo y más adelante espera tener un negocio de accesorios de computo en un local concurrido.Yennifer agradece este préstamo tanto para ella como su grupo comunal.
En la foto viste polo a rayas y chompa negra.
texts.en:
This is the group Reyna de los Angeles.

Yennifer, 20, is one of the members. She is single and lives with her parents. Thanks to her computer studies she is working for a company and for herself. Yennifer installs computer programs and repairs computers. With the income she receives she can pay for her own studies and help her parents with the household living expenses. 

This loan is important to her because it will allow her to buy some computer parts and accessories to continue with her work and continue repairing computers. 

Yennifer is grateful for this loan and in the future hopes to have her own computer accessory business in a busy location. Yennifer is thankful for this loan for herself as well as for her communal group.

In the photo she is wearing a striped shirt and black sweater.

loans.use: to purchase computer parts and accessories.

loans.name: Silvina

texts.en:
Silvina works hard to support her family. She is single and has a dress-making business in the Philippines.

Silvina requested a PHP 15,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy materials, like fabric, threads, and buttons for her business.

Silvina has been in this business for 35 years now. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy materials, like fabric, threads, and buttons for her business.

loans.name: Thol's Group

texts.en:
Age 47 and a farmer from Kampong Cham province’s Prey Chhor district, Thol is married and blessed with four children. The main source of her family’s income is from paddy rice growing on two hectares of land. The current business has returned to her about KHR 26,300 per day. 

This is the first loan for Thol with VisionFund Cambodia (Kiva’s partner). In a group of three, she is the leader. Each group member, including Thol, is seeking the same amount: KHR 1,000,000. 

Thol will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer and rice seed for replanting. She hopes that she can grow her crops seasonally and make a good yield with high income, to buy an additional plot of farmland for her agribusiness’s expansion.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and rice seed for replanting.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Pierre

texts.fr: Pierre est un jeune homme de 32 ans et ayant trois enfants à sa charge.il  est propriétaire d'une petite alimentation dans un quartier de la place. actuellement,il est confronté à un problème de rupture de stock ce qui ne lui permet pas de réaliser de bénéfices considérables.il sollicite donc un crédit dfe 100000 FCFA afin d'augmenter son stock de marchandises et de satisfaire sa clientèle. ce qui lui permettra de péréniser son activité et d'améliorer ses conditions de vie
texts.en: Pierre is a   32-year old man with three dependent children. He has a small grocery shop in his neighborhood. His current challenge is his low stock, which keeps his from making good revenues. He is thus seeking a loan of 100,000 West African francs in order to increase his merchandise stock and meet customer demand. This will allow him to stabilize his business and improve his life conditions.

loans.use: to expand his merchandise stock.

loans.name: Kuidimurod

texts.ru: Куйдимуроду 45 лет. Он добрый и жизнерадостный человек. Несмотря на трудности жизни, он держится уверенно и толерантно. Куйдимурод женат и имеет 3 детей. Он более 25 лет занимается выращиванием сельхоз культур. Куйдимурод с ранних лет занимается этим бизнесом и поэтому имеет большой опыт. Он в основном выращивает картошку. Куйдимурод трудится упорно и поэтому его урожай является высококачественным на местном рынке. Он имеет маленький доход и поэтому он вместе со своей семьёй живет в маленьком и старом домике. Куйдимурод хочет перестроить свой дом, но не имеет денег. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для покупки строительных материалов как цемент, кирпич и т.п. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: uidimurod is 45 years old. He is a kind and upbeat person. In spite of all his life challenges, he has a confident an open manner. Kuidimurod is married and has three children. He has been growing farm produce for over 25 years. Kuidimurod has been doing this type of work from his young age on, and thus he has plenty of experience. He mainly grows potatoes. Kuidimurod works very hard, and this is why his produce is known for its high quality at the local market. His income is small, and he and his family live in a small old house. Kuidimurod would like to remodel his house but lacks the necessary funds. He is requesting a loan in the amount of 2,000 TJS to buy construction materials, such as cement, bricks etc. He is counting on your kindness.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as cement and bricks for rebuilding his house.

loans.name: Jelieta

texts.en:
Jelieta is a 46-year-old woman, living in Kinuman Sur, Ozamis City. 

For the last two years, she has provided for the needs of her five children with the small sum of PHP 2,200 per month she has been earning from her gardening production business. Her business is an aid to the income her husband earns from farming. 

Recently, she requested a loan of PHP 4,500 to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise. She wants to expand her business one day, in order to provide better living conditions for the family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Mujeres Decididas E Independientes Group

texts.es:
Lizette es miembro de la alcancía Mujeres Decididas e Independientes
Lizette tiene 23 años, es soltera y vive con sus padres.durante algun tiempo Lizette trabajo en la lavandería de una amiga, fue allí donde aprendió todo lo referente a ese negocio y viendo que era rentable; hace 04 años decidió poner su propia lavandería, durante todo este tiempo ha ganado muchos clientes quienes acuden a su negocio a prestar sus servicios de lavado, con el dinero de su prestamo podrá comprar una lavadora nueva y otra parte le servirá para realizar mantenimiento técnico a las lavadoras que ya tiene,mas adelante le gustaria abrir otras sucursales de su negocio.Lizette esta agradecida a EDAPROSPO por su préstamo, por que siente que es una oportunidad de progreso y a los inversionistas de KIVA que confían en personas como ella y su alcancía comunal.
*En la foto viste polo azul y pantalon color fucsia.
texts.en:
Lizette is a member of the communal bank Mujeres Decididas e Independientes [Determined and Independent Women]. She is 23 years old, unmarried, and living with her parents. Lizette worked at a friend's laundry service for some time, where she learned all about this kind of business and saw that it was profitable. Four years ago, she decided to open her own laundry; during this time, she has gained many clients who come to her laundry for her washing services. 

With the money from this loan, she will be able to purchase a new washing machine; she will also be able to get some technical maintenance done on the machines that she already has. In the future, she would like to open additional locations for her business. Lizette is grateful to EDAPROSPO for her loan because she feels it is an opportunity for progress, and to Kiva's investors who put their trust in people like her and her communal bank.

*In the photo, Lizette is wearing a blue shirt and fuchsia pants.

loans.use: to purchase a washing machine

loans.name: El Mirador Group

texts.es: El Banco de emprendimiento EL MIRADOR, Está  compuesto por ocho integrantes siete mujeres y un varón, los integrantes del grupo se dedican a distintas actividades  la presidenta del banco es la Sra. Sofia tiene 42 años tiene dos hijos de las edades de 9 y 13 años,  su actividad es la venta de refrigerios y sándwich en su puesto de venta que se encuentra en la localidad de El Torno,  la Sra. Sofia se levanta desde tempranas horas de la mañana para elaborar sus sándwich y también para prepara el almuerzo para su familia, después sale a vender todo esto por la mañana, con el dinero del crédito la Sra. Sofia comprara insumos para la elaboración de sus refrigerios, la Sra. Sofia es una persona responsable y trabajadora esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo económico que le brinda para tener una mejor calidad de vida y seguir adelante superándose por el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en: The “El Mirador” communal bank has 8 members, seven women and one man.  The members of the group carry out a variety of different activities.  The bank president is Sofía, 42.  She has two children age 9 and 13.  Her activity is selling snacks and sandwiches in her sales stand located in El Torno.  Sofía rises very early in the morning to make the sandwiches and also to make lunch for her family.  Then she goes out to sell this in the morning.  Sofía will use the money from the loan to buy ingredients to make her snacks.  Sofía is a responsible, hardworking person who is grateful to the institution for the financial support it provides so she can have better quality of life and continue improving for her family’s well-being.

loans.use: to buy food-making ingredients.

loans.name: Wilson

texts.es: El señor Wilson, es una persona de 37 años de edad de estado civil casado, alcanzo a estudiar hasta la primaria, cuenta con un dependiente económico a cargo el cual es su pequeño hijo, vive en su propio domicilio de tipo rustico con muros de adobe y techo de calamina, que se halla situado en la Comunidad de Tíraque, su actividad económica principal es agrícola, el señor Wilson manifiesta que tiene experiencia en la actividad hace 10 años atrás; anualmente produce papa y trigo. Finalmente el señor Wilson y su esposa manifiestan tener el deseo de poder mejorara su situación económica y para tal efecto se ven en la necesidad de solicitar capital operación para compra de una yunta de toros ya que el cual es muy importante para desarrollar su actividad agrícola, de tal forma con la producción de sus productos poder mejorar las condiciones económicas y al mismo tiempo también mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y sus dependientes.
texts.en:
Wilson, age 37, is married and has an elementary school education.  He has one dependent under his care, his small son.  He lives in his own house, which is rustic with adobe walls and a tin roof.  The house is in the Tíraque community.

His main business activity is farming.  Wilson states that he has ten years of experience in this business, and he produces potatoes and wheat annually.

Wilson and his wife say that they wish to be able to improve their financial situation.  Therefore, they see the need to request a loan in order to buy a team of bulls, which is very important in order to carry out their farming activity.  This way, with the production of their products, they will be able to improve their financial conditions.  At the same time, they will also improve the quality of their lives and that of their dependents.

loans.use: to buy bulls.

loans.name: Vega Monumental Group

texts.es: Jacqueline, que está ubicada al costado derecho de la fotografía es de pelo oscuro y de abrigo negro con flores gris, pertenece al Banco Comunal Vega Monumental, en donde hay distintos rubros entre los cuales se destacan la venta de lácteos, bazar, paramédico, venta de ropa nueva y usada, bisutería, peluquería y tienda de regalos y juguetes. El negocio de ella es un bazar; comenzó hace mucho tiempo con su negocio pero desde Agosto del año 2012 que está ubicada en otro lugar llamado Vega Monumental, lo único difícil ha sido el hecho de que al ser un lugar nuevo lleno de locales hay poca publicidad lo que ha generado que sus ventas bajen un poco más de lo normal, ocupará el préstamo que está solicitando para comprar más mercadería para su negocio. Lo que más le ha  gustado de trabajar con Fondo Esperanza es el hecho de poder conocer distintas historias de vida, la calidad humana con la que se trabaja, y las ganas de poder crear lazos con la gente que forma su Banco Comunal.
texts.en:
Jacqueline who is on the right hand side of the photo has dark hair and is wearing a black coat with gray flowers belongs to the Vega Monumental communal bank.  She comments that there are various businesses among which the following stand out: dairy products sales, general store, paramedic, new and used clothes sales, costume jewelry, barber shop and gift and toy shop.  

Her business is a general store.  She started it a long time ago but since August of 2012 it’s been located in another place called Vega Monumental.  The only difficulty has been that since it’s a new place full of locales publicity is low which has caused her sales to drop a bit below normal.  

She will use the loan she’s requesting to buy more merchandise for her business.  What she’s liked best about working with Fondo Esperanza is the fact of getting to know different life stories, the human quality they work with and the wish to create bonds with the people who form her communal bank.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Mercaditos De Patria Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de vecinos y amigos formaron el banco comunal “Mercaditos de Patria” en el poblado de Patria.  

Teresa tiene 42 años de edad y vive en el poblado de Patria, ella es una persona responsable y amable que sale adelante pues su actividad económica principal es la preparación del plato típico llamado pollipapas y salchipapas y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar más mas insumos como por ejemplo pollos, papas, aceite, salchicha y otras cosas para incrementar su capital de negocio. 

Este banco comunal está conformado por varias personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Los socios se dedican a la agricultura, venta de madera, venta de ropa, venta de comida, a la crianza de animales menores, a la construicciuon de casas y otras cosas más. 

Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. 

(El poblado de Patria se destaca por el comercio de productos de la selva, así como servicios de alojamiento y restaurantes. Punto de ingreso al Parque Nacional del Manu.)
texts.en:
A group of neighbors and friends formed the “Mercaditos de Patria” communal bank in the town of Patria.

Teresa, age 42, lives in the town of Patria.  She is a responsible and kind person who gets ahead.  Her main business activity is preparing typical dishes called ‘pollipapas’ [fried potatoes and fried chicken] and ‘salchipapas’ [fried potatoes and fried sausages].

She now needs a loan to buy more ingredients like chicken, potatoes, cooking oil, sausages, and other thing in order to increase her business capital.

This communal bank is comprised of various people who at every moment seek opportunities to get ahead.  With their daily effort they are giving their children a better future.  The members work in agriculture, sell wood, sell clothes, sell food, raise small animals, build houses, and other things.  The members are grateful for the opportunity they have been given.  They pledge to make their payments on time.

(The town of Patria is known for its  trade in forest products, as well as for accommodations and restaurants. It is the point of entry to the Manu National Park.)

loans.use: to buy more ingredients like chicken, potatoes, cooking oil, and sausages.

loans.name: San Isidro Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado San Isidro está en su ciclo número 4 del programa de comité de mujeres, todas integran el programa de eliminación de pobreza, y por consiguiente están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Cecilia, tesorera del grupo, quien tiene una surtida despensa, y gracias a la cual tiene los ingresos para poder ayudar a su familia, y la cual quiere poder mejorar para dar a sus clientes lo que necesitan. Ella es una persona trabajadora que quiere seguir creciendo.
La Sra. Solicita  este crédito para la compra de insumos para su almacén, como ser bebidas, verduras, gaseosas y demás, lo que le ayudará  a concretar su plan de negocio, y atrapar mas cliente e  ingresos.
En el grupo son 16 mujeres, pero tres de ellas no retiran créditos en este ciclo, pero si integran el grupo, por lo que ellas aparecen también en la foto.
texts.en:
The group called “San Isidro” is in its fourth loan cycle with the Women’s Committee Program.  They have also joined a poverty elimination program and are currently taking a poverty elimination survey.  

One of the members is Sra. Cecilia, who serves as the group treasurer.  She has a stocked food pantry.  Thanks to the income she earns, Cecilia is able to help her family and make improvements by giving her customers what they need.  She is a hardworking person who wants to keep growing.  Sra. Cecilia is requesting a loan so that she can buy products for her shop such as beverages, vegetables, sodas, and other items.  This will help her solidify her business plan, attract more customers, and earn more income.  

There are 16 women in this group, but three of them did not obtain credit in this cycle. They are still in the group, so they also appear in this photo.

loans.use: to buy beverages, vegetables, sodas, and other items.

loans.name: Aguilas Unidas Group

texts.es: Un grupo conformado por 7 personas emprendedoras y con mucha creatividad para los negocios. Así son los integrantes del grupo comunal “AGUILAS UNIDAS”.La Sra. GLORIA  de 53 años de edad  y madre de  4 hijos, ella se dedica hace 20 años  a la venta de tejidos de (chompas, pulóver, chalinas,etc). La Sra. Gloria ha llegado a fidelizar  a sus clientes lo cual le ha generado ganancias para poder cubrir los gastos de su hogar,  en el futuro le gustaría tener un local propio donde poder vender sus tejidos  y así  obtener mayores ganancias económicas. El préstamo otorgado lo invertirá en comprar más lanas y así poder tener más pedidos de prendas de tejido lo cual le ayudará a salir adelante. A la vez  la Sra. Gloria  y todos los integrantes se encuentran  agradecidos con Kiva y Edaprospo por el préstamo otorgado y por la confianza que se  les ha sido brindada. La Sra. Gloria  se encuentra sentada es la primera de la mano izquierda se distingue con polo rojo casaca negra, se  despide dejando la promesa  que cumplirá todas sus metas propuestas.
texts.en:
The group is comprised of seven enterprising people who have a lot of creativity for business.  That is how the members of the Aguilas Unidas communal bank are.

Gloria, age 53, has four children.  She has been selling knitted goods (sweaters, pullovers, and scarves) for 20 years.  Gloria  has come to have loyal customers, which has generated income for her to be able to cover the household expenses.  In the future she would like to have her own place where she would be able to sell her knitted goods.  This way she would get greater earnings.  She will use the loan that was granted to buy more wool.  This way she will be able to have more orders for knitted garments and be able to get ahead.

Gloria and all of the members are grateful to Kiva and EDAPROSPO for the loan that was granted and for the trust that has been placed in them.  Gloria is the first one seated on the left.  She has on a red shirt and a black jacket.  She says goodbye by leaving the promise that she will meet all of her proposed goals.

loans.use: to buy different colors and types of wool

loans.name: Freddy Vicente

texts.es: Freddy, tiene 42 años de edad, esta casado, tiene 1 hijo, vive en el municipio de santa Cruz de Yojoa, junto a su hijo y esposa. Toda su vida se ha dedicado a la agricultura. Cosecha café, banano y  cacao. Esta producción la vende en el mercado local de la zona. Freddy, lleva dos ciclos de préstamos en ODEF con el actual que es por 15,000 Lempiras, con el cual va comprar fertilizantes para los cultivos principalmente de café. Su plan es continuar asistiendo a sus cultivos para aumentar las ventas y cumplir con sus metas.
texts.en: Freddy is 42 years old. He is married and he has one son. He lives in the city of Santa Cruz de Yojoa with his wife and son. He has worked in agriculture for his whole life. He grows coffee, banana and cocoa. He sells his harvest in the local market. Freddy has had two loan cycles with ODEF. With this current loan of 15,000 Lempiras, he will buy fertilizers for his main coffee crop. His plan is to continue help his crops in order to increase his sales and reach his goals.

loans.use: purchase fertilizers used for maintaining his coffee crops.

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es: Ana, tiene 31 años de edad, esta casada, tiene 3 hijos y vive con su familia en el municipio de santa Cruz de Yojoa. Ella tiene cuatro años de tener su propio negocio de venta y confección de ropa, vende ropa para caballeros, niños y damas, también confecciona ropa de todo tipo. Este negocio lo tiene en su casa. Ha solicitado este préstamo por 10,000 Lempiras para comprar ropa nueva para vender y también comprar insumos para elaborar comida y vender, con el objetivo de incrementar los ingresos. Su meta es hacer crecer el negocio y ofrecer mejores productos.
texts.en:
Ana is 31 and married with three children. She lives with her family in the town of Santa Cruz de Yojoa. 

Ana has for four years run her own business out of her home selling and mending clothing. She sells men's, women's, and chlidren's clothing and mends all types of clothes. 

Ana has requested a loan of 10,000 Lempiras for the purchase of new clothing that she can sell. She will also use the loan funds to purchase supplies for preparation of food that she can sell in order to boost her income. Ana's goal is to grow her business and offer better products.

loans.use: to purchase new clothing and supplies for  preparation of food to sell.

loans.name: Luz

texts.es: Luz, de 34 años de edad, es casada y madre de 4 hijos con quienes vive en su casa propia. Luz se dedica a la venta de gaseosas, aguas envasadas y productos comestibles en general como arroz, azúcar, aceite, leche, fideos, harina y otros. Todos estos productos los traslada para su comercialización a los pueblos ubicados en las riberas de los ríos y zonas alejadas de la ciudad en los cuales permanece por varios días hasta culminar con la venta de toda su mercadería con ayuda de su esposo, se inicio en está actividad hace 3 años. Antes de iniciarse con esta actividad sus ingresos económicos no le alcanzaban para solventar las necesidades de sus hijos. Ahora viendo los buenos resultados que esta obteniendo, está pensando aumentar el volumen de sus compras. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1500, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado se compromete una vez más a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado comprará gaseosas, arroz, azúcar, comestibles, entre otros para enviarlos a los pueblos ribereños para su venta.
texts.en: Luz is 34 years old. She is married and is the mother of 4 children, with whom she live in her own home. Luz works selling soft drinks, bottled water and general food products such as rice, sugar, oil, milk, pasta, flour and more. She transports all of these products to sell in the nearby communities located on the riverbanks and in areas far from the city and she stays there for several days until  she has sold all of her merchandise. With the help of her husband, she started this business 3 years ago. Before starting it her income wasn't enough to cover her children's needs. Now that she has seen the good results she is getting, she is thinking of increasing her sales volume. At this time, she will ask for S/. 1500. She is very happy to know she will have financial support, since this way she will feel secure going ahead with her business. On the other hand, she is committed once more to making all of her payments on time. With the amount she has asked for, she will buy soft drinks, rice, food products and more to sen to the riverside communities to sell.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, rice, sugar, and more to sell.

loans.name: Luzdina

texts.es: Luzdina, tiene 60 años, está divorciada, y vive en su casa propia con sus 3 hijos. Luzdina, se dedica a la venta de productos comestibles, por esta razón ha destinado un pequeño espacio en su hogar donde vende sus  productos como arroz, azúcar, aceites, huevos, leche, pan, té y otros. Lo que le gusta de su actividad es que le permite tener un ingreso económico con el cual puede pagar los gastos de su hogar, además puede manejar su economía y espera más adelante establecer una tienda más grande y complementarla con nuevos productos. En este préstamo con Kiva está contenta al saber que contará con un apoyo financiero para su negocio. Con el monto solicitado de S/. 2500 comprará mayor cantidad de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, plátanos, gaseosas y huevos que son los que tienen mayor demanda entre sus clientes.
texts.en: Luzdina, 60, is divorced and lives in her own home with her three children. Luzdina sells edible goods. This is why she has designated a small space in her home where she sells her goods like rice, sugar, oils, eggs, milk, bread, tea, and other things. What she likes about this work is that it allows her to have an income, with which she pays her household expenses. She can also manage her finances and she hopes to later set up a larger store and stock it with new products. She is glad to know that she will have financial support for her business with this Kiva loan. With the amount of S/. 2500 that she has applied for, she will buy more groceries like rice, sugar, plantains, soft drinks, and eggs, which are the goods with the highest demand among her customers.

loans.use: to buy rice and sugar, among other things for her store.

loans.name: Panfilo

texts.es: El señor Pánfilo de 40 años de edad, casado, tiene dos hijos, los cuales aun siguen en la escuela. Pánfilo es una persona  muy querida y respetada en el lugar donde vive, por lo dedicado a su trabajo y a su familia, hay días que tiene que trabajar en jornal en la agricultura para ganar algunos pesos demás y así llevar el pan de cada día a su casa, además trabaja en su pequeña parcela que tiene en el lugar donde vive,  este año la época de frio se adelanto afectando a la producción de papa y maní,  como la única fuente económica son las cosechas de cada año don pánfilo no quiere perder su producción es por eso que está solicitando el crédito para comprar abonos orgánico y químico, el tiene la clara idea que con estos fertilizantes su producción volverá a retomar su normal crecimiento. También declara que en las próximas oportunidades realizara inversiones con créditos mayores que le permitirán emprender negocios con utilidades de mayor valor económico.
texts.en: Señor Pánfilo is 40, married, and has two children who are still in school. Pánfilo is very respected and loved in his neighbourhood. He is dedicated to his work and his family. Some days he has to work as a day labourer on farms in order to earn a few more pesos and provide his family with their daily bread. He also works on his own small plot of land near his home. This year the cold season came on quickly and affected his potato and peanut crops. Because his only source of income is his yearly harvest, Pánfilo does not want to lose his crops. For this reason, he is requesting a loan for the purchase of organic and chemical fertilizers. He knows that these fertilizers will allow his crops to grow normally again. He also tells us that he will take the next opportunity to take out larger loans which will allow him to undertake projects with greater value.

loans.use: to buy organic and chemical fertilizer.

loans.name: 31-Santiaguito Group

texts.es: El Banco de emprendimiento 31-SANTIAGUITO está  compuesto por ocho integrantes, seis mujeres y dos varones,  la presidenta del banco es la Sra. Elizabeth tiene 40 años casada con hijo de cuatro años, ella se dedica a la  venta de refrescos y variedad de dulces, galletas en su puesto de venta que se encuentra   cerca a una escuela de la zona por donde vive,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Elizabeth utilizara este préstamo para la compra de mercadería como  refrescos, dulces  y galletas por cantidad y así de esta manera incrementar su capital de trabajo su razón para solicitar este préstamo es la falta de capital de trabajo, la Sra. Elizabeth va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando cantidad de bebidas y mercadería para seguir surtiendo su negocio,  su deseo de la Sra. Elizabeth es crecer en su negocio tener un puesto surtido y también poder vender comida,  la Sra. Elizabeth es una persona trabajadora se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo que le brindan en la otorgación del crédito.
texts.en:
The Enterprising Bank, 31-SANTIAGUITO, is made up of eight members; six women and two men. The president of the bank is Elizabeth who is 40 years old and married with a four-year-old son. She sells refreshments and a variety of sweets and cookies in her stall which is located near a school in the area she lives. 

This is her first loan with the institution. Elizabeth will use this loan to purchase merchandise such as refreshments, sweets and cookies in quantity and thus increase her working capital. The reason she is requesting this loan is the lack of working capital. Elizabeth is going to use the profits to continue buying drinks and merchandise to continue supplying her business. 

Elizabeth's wish is to grow her business; having a stocked stall and also to be able to sell food. Elizabeth is a hardworking person. She is happy and grateful to the institution for its support in providing her with this loan.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as refreshments, sweets and cookies in quantity.

loans.name: Otgonbayar

texts.en:
Mr.Otgonbayar is 62 years old. He lives with his wife and son in a small house in the Selenge province of Mongolia. His wife, Oyuntsog, is retired from an eastern medical center. His son, Onontuul, is 28 and works at a local company. 

Since 1990, Otgonbayar has been growing organic vegetables. He started this for family use and expanded it into a business. Now they sell their vegetables to retailers at the local market. His wife is planning to start her own business as a medical service provider in a rental place. 

Otgonbayar is now requesting a loan of MNT 2,500,000 to purchase soils and seeds for his plantation and tools for his wife to start her business. Otgonbayar's family are hard-working and responsible people.

loans.use: to purchase soils and seeds for his plantation and tools for his wife to start her business.

loans.name: Las Marias Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Las Marias está en su ciclo número 14º del programa de comité de mujeres, donde cada una pone su mejor esfuerzo por crecer en sus respectivos emprendimientos, también hacen actividades juntas para ir creciendo y ayudar a sus familias.
Mary se dedica a la venta de leche, comenta que ella su día empieza desde muy tempranas horas, ya que tiene que llevar su producto a sus clientes para la hora del desayuno. Cuenta que gracias a su buen producto se ha hecho de muy buena clientela, que fielmente compra de ella. Su sueño es poder seguir creciendo y algún día poder tener un tambo grande.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de leche, para poder tener un mayor stock y de esa forma seguir abasteciendo a sus clientes. En la foto del grupo aparecen 19 mujeres, ya que ese es el numero de miembros en el comité, pero solo 17 retiran crédito en esta oportunidad.
texts.en:
The "Las Marias" group is in its 14th loan cycle of the Women's Committee program, where each woman puts forth her best effort to grow in her respective business. They also do activities together to continue growing and helping their families. 

Mary sells milk and she says that her day starts very early, given that she has to deliver her product to her customers for breakfast. She notes that thanks to her good product she has developed a very good customer base that faithfully buys from her. Her dream is to continue growing and one day be able to have a large dairy farm. She's asking for this loan to be able to invest in the purchase of milk, to have a better stock and therefore continue supplying her customers.

In the photo there are 19 women because this is the number of women in the group, but only 17 received credit in this cycle.

loans.use: to buy milk to sell.

loans.name: Mujeres Talentosas Group

texts.es:
El comité llamado “Mujeres Talentosas”  está en su ciclo número 5º del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante.  Tienen el deseo de poder ayudar a sus familias por medio del trabajo de cada una de ellas.  Una de estas mujeres es Maria, quien vende ropas y calzados.
Ella es una persona muy trabajadora, que con mucho esfuerzo está saliendo adelante, ella es muy buena vendedora, y gracias a ello es que ya tiene muy buena clientela y muy buena venta. Quiere seguir creciendo y ayudando a su familia por medio de su trabajo, es por eso que se está esforzando al máximo.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de calzados y prendas, ya que así podrá seguir con sus ventas y tendiendo los ingresos para el día a día para ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
The committee called “Mujeres Talentosas” (Talented Women) is in cycle #5 in the women’s committee program where they all work and help each other to get ahead.  They want to be able to help their families by means of each one of their jobs.  One of these women is María who sells clothes and shoes.

She’s a very hardworking person who with much effort is getting ahead.  She’s a very good seller and thanks to this has a very good clientele and her sales are good.  She wants to continue growing and helping her family by means of her work which is why she is striving to the maximum.

She asks for this loan to buy clothes and shoes because she’ll be able to continue with her sales this way and earning income for day to day to help her family.

loans.use: to buy clothes and shoes to sell.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Jorge es de la ciudad de Paraguarí, es un joven muy luchador y emprendedor, trabaja y estudia al mismo tiempo, y eso es lo que lo diferencia de los demás.
Está estudiando la carrera de Administración de Empresas, con lo cual quiere poder ayudar a su familia, ya que ellos siempre lo han apoyado para poder estudiar, de acuerdo a las posibilidades de su familia.
Su sueño es poder ser un profesional que pueda ayudar a las demás personas por medio de su conocimiento.  Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en pagar sus clases y también las cuotas de la universidad, lo cual le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Jorge is from the city of Paraguarí.  He is a very determined and enterprising young man.  He works and goes to school at the same time and that is what distinguishes him from others.  He is studying for a career in Business Administration with which he wants to be able to help his family as they have always supported him to be able to study in accordance with the financial resources of his family. 

His dream is to be able to be a professional that can help other people by means of his knowledge.  He is requesting this loan so that he can invest it in paying for his classes and also the university fees, which will be of great help to him.

loans.use: to pay for university classes and fees.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria es Contadora trabaja hace mas de 7 años como contadora en una empresa, esta recientemente casada, y cuenta que su marido es comerciante Sus aspiración es seguir enriqueciendo sus conocimientos profesionales, y es por eso que está haciendo un Post grado en tributo.
Ella es una persona muy visionaria, y está invirtiendo en su educación, ya que sabe que es la única forma de crecer y salir adelante.
Solicita de este crédito para cubrir sus gastos de clases en su post grado, y agradece por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo, ya que poder hacer un curso como estos es costoso, pero esta oportunidad le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Maria is an accountant. She has worked for more than 7 years as an accountant in a firm, she is recently married and says that her husband is a trader. 

Her hope is to keep improving her professional knowledge, and it's to honour this that she is doing postgraduate study. She is a very visionary person, and is investing in her education, because she knows it is the only way to grow and succeed. 

She is applying for this loan to cover the costs of postgraduate classes, and is thankful for the opportunity she is receiving because being able to do a course like this is expensive, but this opportunity will help her a lot.

loans.use: to pay for Postgraduate classes.

loans.name: Crispin

texts.es: Crispin de 51 años, vive en compañía de su esposa Felicia y sus hijos en la casa que heredó de sus padres. Desde muy joven aprendió a trabajar la tierra, desde entonces trabajó muy duro para sacar a su familia adelante. Es por esa razón que pensó en mejorar sus ingresos y emprendió el negocio de venta de verduras y tubérculos en el mercado de la zona, donde sale a vender los días de feria. Este negocio le genera muchas ganancias, pues aprendió a manejar bien sus negocios.  De la misma manera comenta que su vivienda se ubica muy cerca de la ciudad y como cuenta con un pequeño camión para trasladarse le resulta sencillo continuar con esta modalidad de venta. Ahora espera poder mejorar sus ingresos, trabajando con más ahínco.Este es su primer crédito con KIVA, se siente agradecida con el apoyo económico recibido y promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.Crispin, invertirá los S/.1300 soles en la compra de abono orgánico para nutrir sus sembríos.
texts.en:
Crispin, 51, lives with his wife, Felicia, and their children in the house he inherited from his parents.  Since a very young age he learned how to work the land and since then has worked hard to move his family forward.  Because of this, he thought to improve his income and started a business selling vegetables and tubers in the local market where he heads out to sell on market days.  This business generates high profits because he learned to manage his businesses well.  He also comments that his house is located quite close to the city and since he has a small pick-up truck to get around in it turns out to be easy to continue with this way of working.

Now, he hopes to improve his income working even harder.  This is his first Kiva loan and he feels grateful for the economic support provided and promises to be punctual with his installment payments.  Crispin will use the 1,300 soles to buy organic manure to nourish his crops.

loans.use: to buy organic manure.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy spare parts and accessories

loans.name: Otgonhishig

texts.en:
Mrs.Otgonhishig is 36 years old lives with her mother, brother and her son in a ger in the Hovd province of Mongolia. Her mother is on a pension, and her brother lost the ability to work and stays home. She is the only working person in the family, and her son, Battomor, studies at a local school. 

Otgonhishig started her organic dairy products retail business in a rental stall of the local market in 2006. She has two cows, and also produces organic dairy products herself to sell in her stall. 

She is now requesting 2,000,000 MNT to purchase a large amount of dairy products from the countryside to sell to local customers. 

She is a hardworking, positive and strong person.

loans.use: to purchase a large amount of dairy products from the countryside and sell to local customers

loans.name: Jonalyn

texts.en:
Jonalyn is 41 years old, and married with four children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Jonalyn has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy a stock of rice to sell.

Jonalyn has been in this business for two years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy a stock of rice to sell.

loans.name: Amina

texts.en:
Amina, aged 35 years, is a married mother of four children, all of whom attend school. She lives in a rental house that has electricity, but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

For the past six years, she has owned a school whereby children from the neighborhood attend. She faces a major challenge of late payments from parents who have children enrolled in the school. She dreams of establishing more classrooms in the future.

With the loan of KES 25,000 that she is requesting, she wants to purchase furniture and stationary for the school. She decided to join Yehu Microfinance Trust to access loans, to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase furniture and stationary for the school.

loans.name: Khalzankhuu

texts.en:
Mr. Khalzankhuu, 62 years old, lives with his wife and daughter in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in Mongolian traditional ger (portable felt dwelling). 

He and his wife have retired from work and get a state pension. His son has been rendering transportation service to local people using his own micro bus. Recently, his wife began working as a conductor of a bus. As for him, he wants to grow vegetables on his land to eat themselves or sell to vendors. 

So he is requesting a loan of 7,000,000 MNT to cover the cost of growing vegetables such as digging the ground, purchasing seeds, connecting a pipeline and digging a well. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who can't just sit idle. 

Growing vegetables will help the efforts against air pollution as it will turn carbon dioxide into oxygen.

loans.use: to pay for digging the ground, purchasing vegetable seeds, connecting a pipeline and digging a well so he can grow vegetables to eat or sell to vendors.

loans.name: Marie Andre's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de 5 femmes fait parti du banc villageois qui a été crée le 2 novembre 1995. Ce dernier regroupe des femmes qui habitent le même village et ceux des alentours. Elles entretiennent de bonnes relations et font comme activité le commerce et l'embouche.
Debout à droite de la photo et levant la main, Ndella est âgée de 44 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 8 enfants dont 3 garçons. Elle a aussi en charge les 6 enfants de sa coépouse.
Elle envisage avec le prêt de vendre du mil, du niébé, elle compte acheter 100 à 500kg. Elle va acheter aussi 10 bassines de bissap. Elle va faire en activité parallèle l'embouche bovine en achetant un bœuf , quelle va engraisser.
Les bénéfices lui permettront d'épargner, de verser ses intérêts, de renforcer la dépense quotidienne de la famille et de continuer la construction de sa chambre.
texts.en:
This group of five women is part of a banc villageois that was created on 2 November 1995, and whose members are women who live in the local village and surrounding areas. They all have a great relationship, and work in either retail or rearing livestock.

Ndella is standing on the right of the photo with her hand raised, and is 44 years of age. She is married and has eight children, three of whom are boys. With this loan, she plans to buy millet and black-eyed peas which she will sell (between 100 and 500 kilos). She also plans to buy ten bowls of hibiscus flowers. In addition to her current business, she also plans to work rearing livestock, so wants to buy an ox to fatten. 

With her profits, Ndella will be able to save, repay the interest on her loan, contribute to paying her family’s daily expenses, and continue to build her bedroom.

loans.use: To buy black-eyed peas, millet, hibiscus flowers, and an ox.

loans.name: Oswaldo

texts.es:
Oswaldo es divorciado. Vive en la casa de su madre ocupando solo una habitación hecha de adobe y cemento, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona Bajo Tacagua de la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente trabaja por mas de ocho horas como vendedor en una empresa privada, y con lo poco que gana debe cubrir los gastos de alimentación y pago de servicios básicos.
El crédito lo requiere para el aumento de mercadería ya que aparte de trabajar como vendedor también realiza venta de galletas de forma independiente es por eso que solicita el crédito para mejorar sus ingresos.
El sueño de Oswaldo es ser vendedor independiente para posteriormente poder independizarse y tener mas comodidad y también brindarle seguridad a su hijo de  esta forma mejorar su calidad de vida.
Es la segunda vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Oswaldo is divorced. He lives in his mother's house, where he only takes up a room made of adobe and cement. The house is located in the Bajo Tacagua area of the town of La Paz.
He currently works over eight hours a day as a salesperson for a private company. With the little he earns he must pay for the expenses he has with food and basic services.
He requests the loan in order to stock up on merchandise, since aside from working as a salesperson he also sells biscuits independently. That's why he requests the loan so he can improve his profits.
Oswaldo's dream is to be a self-employed vendor so that later on he can become independent and have more comfort. He also wishes to provide security for his son and therefore improve his living conditions.
This is the second time he requests a loan with IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for his busienss

loans.name: Hakim

texts.ru: Хаким житель города Душанбе, столицы Таджикистана. Ему 51 год. У него любящая жена и трое заботливых дочерей. Его жена не работает, она домохозяйка. Хаким как глава семьи сам обеспечивает семью и за эти годы работал в разных профессиях, чтобы его семья ни в чем не нуждалась. Сегодня его дочери взрослые и находятся на выданье. Он уже должен откладывать на их свадьбу. Хаким имеет среднее техническое образование и опыт вождения. Он хотел бы заняться предоставлением услуги такси по маршрутной линии своего города. В столице услуга такси очень востребована. Он планирует работать с 8:00 утра до 20:00 вечера и в день совершать 9 рейсов. Хаким просит кредит для покупки автомобиля марки Opel Karavan и начать свою деятельность. Данный кредит поможет ему заняться собственным бизнесом и зарабатывать хороший доход, за счет которого он смог бы достойно выдать замуж своих дочерей. Хаким надеется на вашу помощь.
texts.en: Hakim is 51 and lives in Dushanbe, the capital of Tajikistan. He has a loving wife and three caring daughters. His wife is a homemaker and does not work. As head of the household, Hakim provides for his family and has worked many different jobs over the years so that his family would not lack for anything. Now his daughters are grown up and ready to get married. He should already be saving up for their weddings. Hakim went to a vocational high school and has driving experience. He would like to start driving a taxi on city routes, as taxi services are very popular in the capital. He plans to work from 8 AM to 8 PM in order to make 9 complete trips per day. Hakim has asked for a loan to buy an Opel Karavan model car and begin working. The loan is helping him to start his own business and and to earn a good income, which will help his daughters to find worthy husbands. Hakim hopes for your support.

loans.use: to purchase an Opel Karavan model car for private taxi service

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy trays and 2 bundles of used clothes to sell in the surrounding area.

loans.name: Arminita

texts.es: Arminita de 57 años de edad, es viuda y tiene 03 hijos de 25, 23 y 18 años con quienes vive en su casa propia. Arminita se dedica a la venta de ropas de segunda mano para damas, caballeros y niños, para toda ocasión, la  cual lo realiza en un local en el interior de su casa propia y un puesto en el mercado, siendo muy solicitada por los vecinos de la zona, amistades y familiares por su trato amable y cordial. Toda su mercadería los compra en una ciudad cercana. Esta actividad  empezó con su propio capital y lo viene realizando sola hace más de  08 años tiempo en el cual llegó a hacerse conocida, logrando hacer crecer su cartera de clientes habituales y hasta el momento le viene apoyando sus hija. Este es su séptimo préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles comprará ropas de segunda mano de diversas tallas y modelos, para damas, caballeros y niños. Toda está mercadería la comprará en volumen, buscando precios bajos por sus compras, de esa manera tendrá mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Arminita is 57 years old, is a widow, and has 3 children (ages 25, 23, and 18) with whom she lives in her own house.  Arminita works selling secondhand clothing for all occasions for women, men, and children.  She does so in a shop inside her house and also at a stand at the market.  She is very sought-after by her neighbors in the community, friends, and family members due to her friendly and cordial service.

She buys all of her merchandise in a nearby city.  She started her business with her own money and has been doing it for more than 8 years, during which time she has become well-known and increased her number of regular customers.  In addition, her daughter is now helping her.

This is her 7th Kiva loan and she is grateful for the financial help that she gets in order to keep going.  In addition, she promises to make her payments on time.  With the amount requested (1000 sols) she will buy secondhand clothes for men, women, and children of various sizes and brands.  She buys all of these goods in bulk, looking for low prices.  In this way, she obtains the best profits.

loans.use: buy secondhand clothing wholesale.

loans.name: Jemi

texts.es:
Jemi, de 37 años de edad, está casada con Jesús quien es empleado y padre de sus 02 hijos de 15 y 20 años de edad respectivamente con quienes vive en su casa propia. Jemi se dedica a la venta de bebidas gasificadas, para eso cuenta con una refrigeradora la cual compró  con ayuda de su esposo y la instalaron en su hogar,  donde atienden a sus clientes amable y cordialmente.Le gusta su negocio pues le permite tener un ingreso económico para apoyar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar, así como también le permite estar en casa para cuidar y atender a sus hijos, tiene planes de ampliar su negocio y abrir un restaurante en su casa ya que su pareja sabe de cocina y ha visto que es una buena zona para su venta. Este es su séptimo préstamco con Kiva, por eso espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.
Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles , comprará bebidas gasificadas de distintas marcas y sabores al por mayor  para así tener mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Jemi is 37 and married to Jesús, who has a job. They live with their two children, ages 15 and 20, in their home, where Jemi has a business selling soda. The couple purchased a refrigerator for soda storage, and are friendly and welcoming to customers who come into their home. Jemi likes her business as it provides her income to help her husband with household expenses and allows her to stay home to care for their two children. Jemi plans to expand the business and open a restaurant. Jesús is a talented cook and has observed that their home is in a good location for a restaurant. 

This is Jemi's seventh loan with Kiva. She welcomes Kiva's support so she can keep pursuing her goals and is committed to making timely payments. Jemi will use the funds she's requesting, 1,000 new soles, for the wholesale purchase of sodas in a variety of brands and flavors. This new inventory will boost her income.

loans.use: to purchase sodas in a variety of brands and flavors.

loans.name: Komlan

texts.fr: Jeune homme de 21ans, Komlan se bat chaque fois pour répondre à ses besoins et à celui de sa femme. Pour cela, il revend depuis 2002 des habits (friperies) et sollicite un premier crédit pour acheter des marchandises. Il espère agrandir sa boutique et avoir une bonne condition de vie.
texts.en: Komlan is a young 21-year-old man, and constantly strives to provide for himself and his wife. To do so, since 2002 he has worked selling second-hand clothing, and has asked for this loan to buy more merchandise. He hopes to expand his store in the future, as well as to have good living conditions.

loans.use: To buy second-hand clothing.

loans.name: Batéma

texts.fr: Batema est mariée et mère de 03 enfants tous à l’école. Ils vivent à Lomé. En 2000, elle a démarré la vente des produits d’alimentation générale et sollicite un premier crédit à WAGES pour acheter des marchandises (riz, tomate, huile….). Le profit lui permettra de se rendre pérenne son activité et de mieux s’occuper de sa famille.
texts.en: Batema is married and has three children, all of whom are at school. They live in Lomé. In 2000 Batema started selling general food items, and has asked for her first loan from WAGES to buy more merchandise (rice, tomatoes, oil, etc.). With the profits she will be able to make her business more sustainable, as well as to better provide for her family.

loans.use: To buy general food items.

loans.name: Afnaan

texts.en:
Afnaan is a 23-year-old single woman living in Jenin in Palestine who is struggling with some health related issues.

Afnaan has a clothing store, and chose to take a loan to increase her stock and improve her income. She wants to expand her store as it pays for her medical and hospital bills.

The biggest challenge in running her business is because she has to travel to Jordan and Egypt for treatment every year, and so she has to close her shop when she leaves. With the loan, she will expand her store and hire an employee so she doesn't have to close the store every time she travels.

Afnaan is a student at Alquds University and the profit from her business will help her pay for her school fees as well.

loans.use: To buy clothing for her store

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es: Manuel desde hace  6 años  inició en  su negocio de mejoramiento de la imagen personal, haciendo cortes de cabello a sus amigos al aire libre, hoy no solo dispone de una peluquería sino también ofrece a sus clientes mercancía variada, como accesorios, ropa, gorros, relojes etc., actividad que le genera ingreso mientras practica el oficio de peluquero. Sus ventas las realiza  de contado desde la 9 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche, y compra en el centro de la ciudad los insumos que usa para su peluquería, además de la mercancía que promociona en las instalaciones de su negocio, a clientes reales y potenciales ubicados en la zona donde se desempeña. Su meta mas adelante es ampliar su local y a futuro tener su propia casa. Su mayor desafío es mantener satisfecho a todos sus clientes, ofreciéndole productos que superen sus expectativas. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace ala Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará mercancía variada como accesorios, ropa, gorros y relojes, con esta inversión proyecta mejorar su negocio, generar mas ingresos satisfaciendo a su clientela y esto es justamente lo que hace que su credikiva sea exitoso.
texts.en:
Manuel started his personal image improvement business 6 years ago, cutting his friends' hair outside.  Today, he not only has a barbershop but also offers various goods to his customers, such as accessories, clothing, baseball caps, watches, etc.  This generates income for him while working as a barber.  He makes his sales via cash and sells from 9 am to 9 pm.  The city market is where he buys the supplies that he uses for his barbershop and also the goods that he promotes to current and potential customers in the area where he works.

His goal for the future is to expand his business and have his own house.  His greatest challenge is to keep all his customers satisfied by offering them goods that exceed their expectations.  He is now applying to his first Kiva loan via the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation.  With it, he will buy various merchandise, including accessories, clothes, baseball caps, and watches.

With this investment, he hopes to improve his business, obtain more income, and satisfy his customers.  This is exactly what makes Kiva loans so successful.

loans.use: buy various merchandise, including accessories, clothing, baseball caps, and watches.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en: Victoria is 62 years old, married, and has one child. Victoria works very hard to provide for them. Victoria runs a general store in the Philippines and applied for a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy more goods to sell in her general store. Victoria has been in this business for 12 years, and she sells a variety of items, including shampoo, coffee, cream and sugar. In the future, Victoria would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional goods to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Islam

texts.en:
Islam is a 25-year-old single man living in Jenin.

Islam used to work for a blacksmith, a year ago he decided to open his own workshop from his savings.

He took a loan from ACAD to buy raw materials such as iron and welding tools. Islam makes metal shelves and windows.

Islam plans to buy a piece of land and build a small metal factory; after he achieves this dream, he wants to get married and start a family.

Islam's biggest challenges are the lack of capital and the lack of skilled blacksmiths to assist him in expansion.

The political situation makes it hard for him to market his product to a wide audience.

loans.use: To buy raw material to expand his workshop

loans.name: Mohammed

texts.en:
Mohammed is a 32-year-old father to 3 girls from Jenin. 

He chose to take a loan to buy cosmetics and household goods for his shop as he wants to increase his income to serve his family in a good manner. Mohammed opened his shop a year ago, it was very small, but he was able to expand it after he got financial access.

His future goals are to provide a good livelihood for the family and to be able to send his girls to college.

He has a health issue that makes it difficult for him to work, but his wife helps him.

loans.use: To purchase cosmetics and households goods for his shop

loans.name: Jihan

texts.en:
Jihan is a 44-year-old mother of 5 children living in Tulkarem area.

She took a loan from ACAD to rehabilitate the irrigation network for her thyme farm by buying new pipes, a pump, and a water tank. The new irrigation system will increase the efficiency and allow her to expand her production.

Jihan starting her thyme farm by investing in a bee hive project, then she decided to start this thyme farm, and now she collects the thyme, dries it, and sells it to the local market.

Her future goals are to develop her project and to plant another piece of land with peach trees. Jihan sees the lack of labor and the difficulties in marketing in winter as her main challenges, as well as wild pigs that destroy the plants.

loans.use: to rehabilitate the irrigation network for her thyme farm

loans.name: Norwin Aaron

texts.es:
El señor Norwin Aaron posee un negocio de venta de Ropas usada ubicada cerca de la terminal de buses del departamento de león.

Este negocio de señor Norwin Aaron lo ha ido haciendo crecer para en un futuro sea el sostén de su familia ya que igual su familia lo indujo a este tipo de negocio.

El inicia sus labores muy de mañana a las 8 am para ofrecerles a los diferentes clientes retirándose a su hogar alas 5:30 pm para descansar.

El  crédito que esta solicitando a Ceprodel será utilizado para compra de pacas de ropas usada, gorras, zapatos y bolsos para así ofrecerle a su clientela una variedad de productos de mejor calidad para satisfacerles su demanda por lo que tendría más ingresos para mejorar su nivel de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Norwin Aaron has a second hand clothing business located near the bus terminal in the department of León.

He has been growing his business so that in the future he can support his family, since it was his family who encouraged him to get involved.

Norwin Aaron starts his work day at 8:00 a.m. and tends to customers until 5:30 p.m., when he goes home.

The loan he is requesting through Ceprodel will be used to buy packs of used clothing, caps, shoes and bags.  This will allow him to offer more variety to his customers to satisfy demand.  His income will increase and this will improve his and his family's lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy second hand clothing, hats, shoes and bags.

loans.name: Klousse

texts.fr: Afin de renforcer son stock de céréales et prendre soin de sa famille (marié et père de 06 enfants dont 01 scolarisé), Klousse fait une demande de crédit à WAGES pour pouvoir répondre à ses besoins. Avec une ancienneté de 25ans dans l’activité, il s’approvisionne à Lomé et dans les villes reculées du pays et s’y plait bien car cela lui procure des revenus considérables. Âgé de 44ans, son souhait est d’élargir son terrain de distribution et pourquoi pas exporter les céréales à l’étranger.
texts.en:
Klousse has requested a loan from WAGES in order to increase his cereal stocks and take care of his family (he is married and has six children, one of whom is at school). He has worked in this business for 25 years, and gets his supplies in Lomé and remote villages throughout the country. He is pleased with his business as it provides him with considerable income. 

Klousse is 44 years of age. His wish is to increase his distribution area, as well as to export cereals abroad.

loans.use: to buy cereals.

loans.name: Adjovi

texts.fr: Adjovi est mariée et n’a pas d’enfants en charge. En 2011, elle a démarré la vente des produits d’alimentation générale et sollicite un premier crédit à WAGES pour acheter des marchandises (riz, tomate, huile….). Le profit lui permettra de rendre pérenne son activité et de mieux s’occuper de sa famille. Elle est âgée de 26ans.
texts.en: Adjovi is married, and has no children under her care. In 2011 she started selling general food items, and has asked for her first loan from WAGES to buy more merchandise (rice, tomatoes, oil, etc.). The profits she makes will allow Adjovi to make her business more sustainable, as well as to better provide for her family. She is 26 years of age.

loans.use: To buy general food items.

loans.name: Oydinoy

texts.ru: Добрый человек, который всегда старается улучшить условию проживания, и надеется на светлое будущее, нуждается финансовой поддержки. Ее зовут Ойдиной. Ей 42 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3  детей. Так как она живет в сельской местности, так и имеет хорошую возможность для развития своего бизнеса, скотоводством. Она более 22 года занимается скотоводством и имеет большой опыт по данной отрасли бизнеса. Она так хорошо ухаживает за своим скотом, словно знает и понимает язык своего скота. Благодаря хорошему состоянию скота, она имеет своих постоянных клиентов. Она хочет развевать бизнес и получать больше дохода. С полученного дохода она планирует улучшить условию проживания. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1300 долларов США для покупки скота. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: A kind person, who always tries to improve living conditions and hopes for a bright future, needs financial support.  Her name is Oydinoy.  She is 42 years old, married and raising three children.  Because she lives in a rural area, she has a good opportunity for developing her animal husbandry business.  She has been involved in animal husbandry for over 22 years and has a lot of experience in this business area.  She takes such good care of her livestock, as if she knows and understands the language of her livestock.  Thanks to the good condition of the livestock, she has regular customers.  She wants to develop her business and earn a higher income.  Oydinoy plans to use the resulting income to improve her living conditions.  She is requesting a loan in the amount of 1300 US dollars to buy livestock.  She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Monica

texts.en:
Monica, age 50, raises, breeds, and sells pigs to earn an income. She is married and lives in Labuyo, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental.
 
Monica joined GDMPC in 2009 in order to gain access to financial services. Her goal was to help improve her living situation and increase her ability to engage in business activities. 

She is presently requesting a loan of PhP 18,000 to buy more piglets to raise and sell. 

In the future, Monica plans to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy piglets

loans.name: Poy's Group
